Name: Dark Genesis
Desc: Deathly Lightning attacks numerous enemies with a chance of temporarily Stunning them. Dark Genesis does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status. When Dark Genesis is learned, it also increases Dark Energy Chain/Battle Burst/Dark Shock damage permanently and using skills to directly attack enemies during this skill's cooldown strikes lightning onto a single enemy.

H.Old:
Consumes 200 MP. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 520% damage 8 times and stuns them for 4 sec.
Cooldown: 30 secs
[Passive Effects: [Final Attack Typed Skill] With direct attack skills in use, this skill creates a 60% chance of increasing Lightning by 250% DMG, Dark Energy Chain, Battle Spurt, Dark Lightning by 60% damage.]
H.New:
MP Cost: 200. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 520% Damage 8 times.
Stuns Normal monsters for 4 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
[Passive Effects: [Final Attack Type Skill] Direct Attack skill hits create a 60% chance of a lightning attack at 250% Damage and increasing Damage +60% for Dark Chain, Battle Burst, and Dark Shock.]
